name: WeGraduate
overview:
WeGraduate represents a revolution in online education. We bring the world’s top non-profit major universities right to your fingertips via our web platform. Through our state-of-the-art web infrastructure we are improving the way great universities educate students.

Maintaining the integrity and quality of our university turned distance learning partners is our top priority. Our program development, student enrollment and support services are in line with this belief. The aim is to create lasting partnerships that enable our educational partners to expand their educational reach through effective, profitable, and fully fleshed out online learning solutions.

WeGraduate provides universities with the tools, expertise, capital, and global recruiting required to successfully compete in an industry currently cluttered with for-profit businesses that offer, at best, mediocre online degrees.
